title: [Large-Scale] Development of Educational Leadership and Academic Integrity in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of digital education tools, game-based learning, and educational leadership experience
context.additional_context: Blended short-term intensive course conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, primarily targeting current practitioners (30s)

learning_goals: Develop one or more academic integrity education scenarios by applying participatory digital game design principles.
Propose three or more leadership practice strategies through peer assessment and feedback using online collaboration tools.
Analyze plagiarism and cheating cases in digital environments and present prevention strategies as a five-step process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
